hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT fixedChargesConfigDO.octroiBourneBy, fixedChargesConfigDO.insuredBy, riskSurchargeInsuredByDO.percentile FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.operations.ratecalculation.CashRateCalculationFixedChargesConfigDO fixedChargesConfigDO, com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RiskSurchargeInsuredByDO riskSurchargeInsuredByDO WHERE fixedChargesConfigDO.cashHeader =:header AND fixedChargesConfigDO.priorityInd =:priorityInd AND fixedChargesConfigDO.insuredBy = riskSurchargeInsuredByDO.riskSurchargeInsuredByCode
